actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 with respect to reporting requirements for small plans.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to prescribe alternative simplified methods for providing disclosure to participants in smaller pension plans under the reporting requirements of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 with respect to reporting requirements for small plans.
